@usedefaults
{{timestamp}}

# this makes sure bootstrap datatables functionality is used
{{datatables_use}}

h3. AYS Repo Runs

{{aysruns repo:$$repo reponame:$$reponame}}

{{breadcrumb:
    - AYS81 : /
    - Repositories: /ays81/repos
    - Repo ${reponame}: /ays81/Repo?reponame=${reponame}
    - Runs: /ays81/Runs?reponame=$$repo
}}

h4. Actions
{{actions:
- display: Remove all runs in DB
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/deleteRuns
  input:
    - name: repository
      value: $$reponame
      type: hidden

  showresponse: True

}}

{% if error is defined %}
    Error : ${error}
{% else %}
    {{html:
        <table class="table table-striped table-bordered display JSdataTable dataTable">
        <thead>
          <td>Run ID</td><td>Run AT</td><td>State</td>
        </thead>
        {% for run in runs -%}
        <tr>
          <td><a data-dummy="${run.key}" href="ays81/RunModel?reponame=$$reponame&runid=${run.key}">${run.key}</a></td>
          <td><span class="jstimestamp" data-ts="${run.epoch}"></span></td>
          <td>${run.state}</td>
        </tr>

        {% else %}
        No run for this repository yet.
        {% endfor %}
        </table>
    }}
{% endif %}
